articles.description: Among major losers, Indian Railway Finance Corporation Ltd retreated from its 52-week high levels on Wednesday, tanking more than 5.5 percent to hit a day’s low of Rs 67.23 per share on BSE.

articles.title: ‘A multi asset mutual fund could deliver 100 bps higher returns than a DIY portfolio’ - Cafemutual
articles.description: Sahil Kapoor, Head of Products & Market Strategist, DSP Mutual Fund talks about the market and the need to invest across asset classes. He also talks about the DSP Multi Asset Allocation Fund.
articles.content:
